Title: A Test of Endurance
Description:
I have taught you everything that I can, $n. It is time you spoke with Instructor Myang.

The fights that she stages are less traditional than the sparring matches I am used to. Nevertheless, the path of a traveling adventurer like yourself is unpredictable, and a broad knowledge of fighting styles is an admirable trait.

Farewell, $n, and best of luck on the remainder of your training.
ObjectivesText: Report to Instructor Myang on the western side of the Tian Monastery.
RewardText:
Greetings, $n. You are becoming quite famous among the trainees here. I have already heard your name whispered several times, usually between the puffy and discolored lips one of your sparring partners.

I'm looking forward to working with you.
